node.display_long_description:
For the first time ever, Star Wars Pinball surrounds us in virtual reality! Star Wars Pinball VR collects 8 AMAZING TABLES:
 • The Mandalorian 
 • Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope 
 • Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back 
 • Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi 
 • Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
 • Star Wars Rebels
 • Masters of the Force
 • Classic Collectibles
 
 Exciting new features exclusive to this release: 
 • The fully customizable FAN CAVE houses your “virtual” pinball table and items you earn. 
 • TOTAL IMMERSION MODE allows you to experience everything at table level. 
 • 360-DEGREE MINIGAMES surround you with iconic Star Wars set pieces. 
 
 Other features from past Star Wars Pinball releases return: 
 • HAPTIC FEEDBACK for controllers so it feels like actual pinball
 • CAREER MODE for short, targeted gameplay sessions
 • FORCE POWERS to power up your play
 • A CANTINA JUKEBOX of John Williams music

nodes.title: Star Wars Pinball VR - Hotfix - 05.06.
nodes.body_text:
Hi Pinball pals!

A Hotfix arrived for the Oculus Quest platform, check out the full scoop below:

- Stability improvements
- Fixed a possible issue where players could fall out of the Fan Cave
- Fixed a visual glitch where the ball reacted unexpectedly to getting near the right flipper.
- Changed Luke’s lightsaber in the Episode VI table model
- Fixed an issue in Options where the Total Immersion’s button mapping could not be changed.
- Switching to total immersion mode now puts the player in the central position first
- Fixed an issue where a countdown was included whenever the game was in a paused state
- Fixed an issue where the minigames kept resetting the camera view
- After a mini-game, players will teleport back in a proper position
- Players will not shrink down at certain positions in the Fan Cave anymore
- Players can now highlight Holocron stands in the Fan Cave and see their unlock requirements
- Increased the acquisition point limit of the Sith and Jedi Holocrons from 10,000,000 to 10,000,000,000 (as was intended originally)
- In the Cantina Jukebox, The Asteroid Field track now plays correctly
- Rebels table voiceover volume is slightly decreased
- Improved nudge physics
- Fixed a leaderboard issue
- Various other bugfixes and tweaks

Thank you for your support and have fun!

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription: I am a Quest 2 user and I am a bit disappointed about the graphics resolution. It seems, that the game doesn't use the native Quest 2 render resolution, but a lower one, making it a bit pixelated. Other than that, the game is great. I am playing the tables (beside the new ones of course) since many years on my Android device. There, the tables where already a lot of fun. But in VR, this is even more fascinating and very immersive. Absolutely nice game play, fantastic level of detail of each table and the Star Wars fan cave is a nice idea. All in all a good game and I hope, that they will increase the render resolution for Quest 2 users in an update.

developerResponse.body: Hi! Glad to hear that you are enjoying the game, and thanks for the constructive criticism! We are looking into this! Have a nice day!
